Transcription for 1003691

I see God, I see your treasure, as we reach the cross of gold.
It will be a happy happy, with an honest new uncle.
Now the world will grow with goodness, and the land will be bright.
But we are forever singing, singing through the day and night.
I see God, I see your treasure, as we reach the cross of gold.
It will be a happy happy, with an honest new uncle.

It will be a happy happy, with an honest new uncle.
